text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Narration
Store Manager
Mimi
Saya
Yui
Riko

At café "Le Moment" nestled in the corner of the city,
The rain has stopped, under the blue sky──

Its regulars are invited over today...
It seems like some fun event is taking place──

What will it be~? We're servin' shaved ice,
a new menu for the next season~...

Strawberry~, salted caramel~, and matcha!
Just tell us what yer favorite flavor is~!

Hmm...
I think I'll go with strawberry.

Yes, it's very delicious──
There's a delightful harmony in its unique texture...

The fluffy texture on top of the shaved ice...
What do you call it? It's so addicting...

It's called "espuma"...
It melts in your mouth...

We'll set one flavor for the season~
And the rest on weekly rotation.
So y'all's opinions are super duper important!

Ahaha, what a huge responsibility...!
But,they're all so goood... It's hard to choose...

I'm glad to hear it~! But, it'd be great if you just go
with your gut and it snappy~!

Besides, this samplin' event is our way of thanking
everyone!

Makin' sure that everyone enjoys the food
is the most important goal here!

Huhhh, so that's what this is for.
...But why with this group of people?

Everyone here loves sweets...
And y'all come out tryin' 'em new stuff on the menu right away!

Even though we all got our different tastes, "Le Moment" can't
be the way it is without its customers.

...Indeed, while the delicious food certainly is what draws people
in, I'm sure everyone stays for the warmth this café can give.

It's shaved ice though, so is it really warm?
Hey Manager, I vote for the salted caramel one.

Nfufu, first vote goes to salted caramel~!
Don't ya hold back on me! Let me know your faves~!
